REQ! Saab SK60 for fsx

Sure is popular, 61 seeds and 58 leeches right now.  Thank you.
Has anyone had a chance to load it and see if it's OK?
Downloaded and installed.  FSX shows a white screen after loading aircraft.  Anybody else having this issue?

in the VC next to the throttle the yellow and black switch is the wing sweep, above that is the auto wing sweep.  It installs a manual also so look at that and here is the glass fix in vc:

Please download http://www.irissimulations.com/download/canopy_reflect.zip 

Unzip and copy into your F-14 Texture folders making sure you overwrite the old canopy_reflect.bmp file. 

Regards
